trends: There have been no other sightings in Westmoreland
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Nice bright light turning to a red-orange light moving up and down, but staying in the same area for over two hour s.
divs: Sighting DetailsSaturday night my wife and I where out side just looking at the night sky relaxing. My wife looking out over the tree tops, said look at that nice bright star. We where just starring at it,and I told her that wasn't there last night. Looking at the light I noticed that it was moving up and down. I walked inside grabbed the camera and took pictures. Watching it for two hours the lights suddenly.The lights on the object went out. The next night went to the same spot no light. I took a picture in the same location. The object lite up move about 8 miles stopped and stayed there for about 2 hour and the light went out didn't see it anymore.
